scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an architectural setting. On the left, the Angel Gabriel, with blue and white wings and wearing a red cloak over a white robe, kneels and presents a scroll to the Virgin Mary. The scroll unfurls and displays text. The Virgin Mary, on the right, is seated, dressed in a blue robe, and is reading from an open book. Behind her is a richly patterned red curtain. The background features a brick wall and a window with tracery. The scene is framed by an arched architectural element with decorative borders.
